name: Google Security
subject: Security Alert: New Login Detected
body: A new sign-in attempt was detected from an unknown device. If this was not you, reset your password immediately...

name: Bank of America
subject: Your Monthly Statement is Ready
body: Your March 2025 statement is now available. Log in to view your transactions...

name: Amazon Deals
subject: Limited-Time Discounts on Electronics!
body: Get up to 50% off on the latest gadgets and accessories. Shop now before the sale ends...

name: Nike Store
subject: Exclusive Sneaker Drop - Early Access
body: Be the first to grab our new limited-edition sneakers before they sell out. Order now...

name: Spotify Premium
subject: Your Subscription is Renewing Soon
body: Your Spotify Premium subscription will renew on March 20, 2025. No action is required if you wish to continue...

name: LinkedIn
subject: New Job Alerts Matching Your Profile
body: We found new job postings that match your experience. Check them out now...

subject: You Have 5 New Friend Requests

subject: New Story Mentions!
